channel.title: Please help asap! Client Sounds
channel.description: Hey i am using a synergy 317 source.. when i attack npc it make a combat noise like runescape.. The sound is like the swords and spells.. I dont want this. and idk how to turn the sounds off. There is no mute interfaces or anything. How do i delete these sounds??????

item.title: Please help asap! Client Sounds
item.dc:creator: @Chosen_Pkz Chosen Pkz
item.description:
@Chosen_Pkz wrote:

Hey i am using a synergy 317 source… when i attack npc it make a combat noise like runescape…
The sound is like the swords and spells… I dont want this. and idk how to turn the sounds off. There is no mute interfaces or anything.
